seoSection.trainerMentor: Introducing Skillslash’s trainers and mentors below, who are there to help you on your data science course journey. Each of them mentioned below are experts in their specific fields and continuously work with us to help give the best data science training experience and help you reach your goals and uncover your potential.
seoSection.ProjectsPara: At Skillslash, our major aim is to give you the practical experience that you will need to succeed in the real world. Apart from just giving you the know-how of the theory we give you the real life training of how to use the theory learnt in actual projects.
seoSection.CohortsPara: The dates of our upcoming sessions for Skillslash’s data science course in Mumbai are out! Mark your calendars, to begin your data science training in Mumbai, and discover what’s waiting for you ahead!
seoSection.BatchProfilePara: This data science course in Mumbai is created to meet the needs of everyone form multiple industries, backgrounds and levels of experience. It does not matter if you are a graduate, a postgraduate, or a professional, Skillslash's data science course in Mumbai is for everyone as we believe the diversity adds to the richness and interactivity of the data science course discussions

aboutCity.title: Data Scientist Course in Mumbai
aboutCity.desc: Mumbai is a vibrant and bustling metropolis in southern India.  It is a major hub for technology and innovation, hosting numerous tech companies and startups. The city offers a unique blend of modernity and tradition, with a diverse cultural landscape, exquisite cuisine, and a pleasant climate. Mumbai is also renowned for its lush parks, educational institutions, and a thriving arts and music scene, making it a dynamic and sought-after destination for professionals and visitors alike.

SeoCertificate.desc: Work directly with leading AI companies as a part of the course on their live projects. After successful project completion, you will get Data science training certification as Data Analyst before you start appearing in interviews
SeoCertificate.altM: Get Microsoft Certification by taking best data science course in Mumbai
SeoCertificate.altR: Get Real Work Experience Certificate by taking best data science course in Mumbai online
SeoCertificate.CertificationPara: Skillslash, provides you with valuable certifications as a way to demonstrate your success and knowledge. This data science course in Mumbai is a way for you to earn two types of data science certification - Microsoft Certification & Real-time work experience certification, both of which provides you with the competitive edge you need to succeed in the real job market.
SeoCertificate.MicrosoftPara: With Skillslash, one earns their very own Microsoft certification, all you have to do is simply enroll in our course programs and successfully complete the training. Once you earn your Microsoft certificate you can now add it to your profile resume for recruiters to see and you to get hired in top companies.
SeoCertificate.RealWorkPara: Successfully completing our data science course in Mumbai includes a golden opportunity to work with MNCs and startups on actual live projects, and earn a real-time work experience certification from the companies. This real work experience advantage will boost your job profile and give you the much needed edge to get your dream job and build your career.

Module0.title: Data Science Course in Mumbai with Microsoft Certification

desc: Skillslash, an educational data science course provider located in India, has come up with a data science course that fits all. This data science course in Mumbai comes with expert led training, dual certification, that is, a microsoft certification and real-time work experience certification to add to your resume and give you the much needed push in the data science job field.

Offering data science training in the city of Mumbai multiple areas of data analytics, machine learning, and statistical analysis. We, at Skillslash provide students with all the skills, models, and insights in this all inclusive data science course in Mumbai. Moreso, the data science course in Mumbai is developed and comes with real-time work experience and guaranteed job referrals which give participants the push to create their data science careers.

Our Data Science Course in Mumbai gives you complete access to an all-inclusive course curriculum that includes key data science concepts from python, to advanced learning and data science tools with practical applications of the same. Not only that, this data science course in Mumbai provides an opportunity for you to work within your domain of choice may it be healthcare, finance, or marketing. So, become a data scientist in your own domain with Skillslash.

Module0.title: Is data science a good career for you ?

desc: The field of Data Science is a growing area of demand in many companies and corporations today. And by mastering data science you can become important assets to companies as they help turn data into insights and play a key part in the organization’s decision-making process.
In the current work environment, to be a data science professional comes with many benefits because:

Many major MNCs, startups and almost all companies are looking for data science skilled individuals to join their company. The companies hiring are ready to give you a competitive pay range and incentives that come with the job of a data scientist as it is a highly competitive job market.

Module0.title: Why to choose a Data Science Course in Mumbai ?

desc: If you are debating where to begin data science learning and working, Mumbai is a perfect city to learn and work in data science. This is because Mumbai offers multiple job opportunities and learning courses in data science like this data science course in Mumbai by Skillslash.  Not only that, completing one's data science training in Mumbai increases the number of job opportunities, internships that are hiring and you can apply for after completing your data science training.

Module0.title: Why Learn Data Science in Mumbai ?

desc: Mumbai being a technology hub of a city of India is the perfect place for you to venture into the field of data science. With the city’s increased urbanization, presence of MNCs and the constantly growing startup arena the city offers a number of job opportunities especially in the field of data science.

The data science environment in Mumbai is at its peak and still growing due to its strong technological center, flow of talent into the city, urbanization, a growing startup and corporate arena. Therefore, Mumbai would make for the perfect place for you to learn data science and work in data science.

Module0.title: Why take Skillslash’s Data Science Course in Mumbai ?

desc: We at Skillslash, are bringing to you one of the top-notch data science certification course in Mumbai powered by Microsoft. This data science course in Mumbai is created by data science industry experts with a perfect mix of theory and practical experience to help you navigate the real world.
Choosing this data science course in Mumbai comes with the benefits of:
- Real work experience on actual projects of companies and a real-time work experience certificate for the same.
- Hands-on training with interactive learning sessions and live recorded sessions available to you at any time .
- Lifetime access to a comprehensive expert curated learning curriculum and more.

Module0.title: What are the benefits of the Skillslash data science course in Mumbai ?

desc: Recruiters in companies are looking at candidates and applications with a strong data science background, practical experience and work experience before choosing their data scientists and employees.
And this is where Skillslash’s Data science course in Mumbai will help you greatly.
Here’s how this data science course in Mumbai aims to help you in your data science career :
1. An all-inclusive course curriculum created by industry experts .
3. Real-time work experience pushes you to work on actual real time projects for companies and earn a real-time work experience certification for the same.
4. Backing you with a beneficial Microsoft Certification after completing the Data Science Course in Chennai

Module0.title: What is different about Skillslash’s Data Science Course in Mumbai ?

desc: When it comes to choosing data science courses, there are so many options available to you with a simple tap of a key, then why should you choose Skillslash, why choose this data science course in Mumbai ?

You choose Skillslash’s data science course in Mumbai because we provide you with everything- from theory to practical to further aid in jobs and placements. As this data science course in Mumbai is designed specially to equip you with the data science skills and content knowledge with practical experience that will get you a job in the data science job market.
Throughout this data science course in Mumbai we equip you with multiple instruments to help speed up your job placement process, these include :
- Real- time work experience & Real-time Work Experience Certification
- Lifetime access to course dashboards for you to come back and refresh your knowledge anytime.
And more in HR, Marketing and Commerce fields for you to explore with us at Skillslash through this data science course in Mumbai.

Module0.title: What is the Learning Curriculum of this data science course in Mumbai ?

desc: This Data Science Course in Mumbai has a thorough syllabus curated by industry experts and covers all the bases in data science. By deciding on this  course one starts with the basics and learns everything about data science that is needed to survive and succeed in the data science job market.

From the basics to the advanced levels everything in the curriculum is well-thought and curated by experts in the industry and is taught with practical aid and examples to create interactive and lively training sessions.
The data science course curriculum includes the topics of:
- Introduction to Programming, Code editors basics, Python basics

Module0.title: What are the course program options offered by Skillslash in Mumbai ?

desc: Currently, we offer specialization courses in the advanced data science and AI course and the Business Analytics course for professionals. Both these curriculum courses are made available to you with two Program plans:

The Pro Plan: This plan is placed at a cost of IN 65,000 (without GST) and gives you a 1 year live class subscription and a 2 year subscription to our Learning Management system dashboard, accompanied with 7+ industry projects and 1 capstone project.

The Pro Max Plan:  This plan is placed at a cost of INR 1,20,000 (without GST) and comes with multiple benefits that include: job assistance, 4 year live class subscription, lifetime access to our learning dashboard, unlimited job referrals, 15+ industry projects, 3 capstone projects, 2 domain training, 6 months project certification from companies and a microsoft certification.
* Both these plans come with monthly EMI options and scholarship options. *

Module0.title: What are the different domain projects included in this course ?

desc: This data science course in Chennai offers you an opportunity to work on 10+ industry-partnered capstone projects in over 6+ domains, while practicing with 20+ tools.

chap.title: BFSI Domain
desc: 1. Predicting credit default: (Analyze a customer’s financial records, such as credit line number, age, payment history, and past 6 months’ delinquency history to forecast the likelihood of the customer’s default on future payments. )
2. Foreign currency exchange rate prediction:(Predicting foreign currency exchange rates to make informed decisions in international financial transactions. )

3. Fraud detection for online/mobile banking services: (You will implement advanced machine learning algorithms and anomaly detection  techniques to identify and prevent fraudulent activities that ensure the trust of customer’s financial transactions. )

chap.title: Healthcare
desc: 1. Heart disease prediction: (You will build a reliable machine learning model for predicting the risks of heart diseases on the basis of patient’s data, to aid early diagnosis and timely medical treatments. )

2. Google Mobility data prediction: ( You will use historial Google mobility data, leveraging machine learning algorithms and statistical models to analyze future mobility patterns for insights into disease trends and behaviors. )

chap.title: Retail & Ecommerce
desc: 1. Recommender Systems :(Here, you learn to enhance customer experience for your organization and further your company’s engagement statistics)
And more in HR, Marketing and Commerce fields for you to explore with us at Skillslash through this data science course in Chennai.

Module0.title: What is the Scope for Data Scientists in 2023-2024 ?

desc: A study report by the Data Science Recruitment Agency, Nascom and the Social Media Platform, Zynga shows that data science related jobs and job opportunities are only growing in demand as the years pass and quite fast in comparison to the average growth of other fields and occupations.

With its constant predicted growth, the big data analytics and data science market is expected to grow to around $103 billion and more all around the world, and at a steady pace at around 33 percent growth rate in India.

Module0.title: What is the Data Science course in Mumbai’s course duration ?

desc: The Data Science course in Mumbai being an online data science training platform lasts between 5 months to 3 years in terms of your access to the course dashboard. This course is designed to be a self-paced learning course thereby you can complete the course at your own pace with no rush while keeping up with your work or other commitments.

Module0.title: Module 0
Module0.descS: Our courses start off with this module that offers a basic overview of programming in data science for both beginners and advanced users who wish to strengthen their fundamental skills.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Programming ( 3 hrs )
desc: Source code Vs bytecode Vs machine code, Compiler Vs Interpreter, C/C++, Java Vs Python.

chap.title: Chapter 2: code editors basics (1 hrs)
desc: Different type of code editors in python, Introduction to Anaconda and IDEs

chap.title: Chapter 3: python basics (1 hrs)
desc: Variable Vs Identifiers, Strings Operators Vs Operand, Procedure oriented Vs Modular programming.

chap.title: Chapter 4: statistics basics & probability (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central Tendency & dispersion, Inferential statistics and Sampling theory.

Module0.title: Module 1
Module0.descS: Through a hands-on approach, you will learn key programming concepts of Python, MatplotLib, Seaborn and languages commonly used in the data science field. Whether you're aspiring to become a data scientist or simply seeking to harness the power of programming for data analysis, this module equips you with the essential skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize data effectively.

chap.title: Chapter 2: PYTHON INTRODUCTION (1 hrs)
desc: How a Python Program runs on our system?
Features of Python Memory Management in Python,

chap.title: Chapter 6: EXPECTION HANDELING
desc: Nestedtry-except block & Default except for block.

chap.title: Chapter 7: MODULES IN PYTHON
desc: Importing Modules and different import statement

chap.title: Chapter 8: FILE HANDELING
desc: Why do we need File Handling?

chap.title: Chapter 10: NUMPY IN PYTHON
desc: Intro & use of numpy, What is an array?

chap.title: Chapter 11: PANDAS IN PYTHON
desc: Exporting Dataframe to CSV and Excel

chap.title: Chapter 13: Seaborn
desc: Working with seaborn on titanic dataset

Module0.title: Module 2
Module0.descS: By the end of the module, you will have mastered statistical tools such as probabilistic theory, hypothesis testing and regression analysis, all in the context of practical data science applications and the knowledge they need to be at the forefront of data science and lead data-driven innovations.

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Probability theory and Statistical Inferences ( 4 hrs )
desc: Discrete Probability Distributions - Binomial, Poisson etc
Continuous Probability Distributions - Gaussian, Normal, etc

chap.title: Chapter 2: Statistics Foundations (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central tendency and Dispersion
Sampling theory and scales of measurement

chap.title: Chapter 3: Hypothesis Testing and its Applications (1 hrs)
desc: Basic Concepts - Formulation of Hypothesis, Making a decision
Advanced Concepts - Choice of Test - t test vs z test
Evaluation of Test - P value and Critical Value approach

chap.title: Chapter 4: Exploratory Data Analysis and the Art of Storytelling (1 hrs)

Module0.title: Module 3
Module0.descS: Explore cutting-edge algorithms, model optimization, and deep learning architectures, all while gaining practical experience through hands-on projects.

chap.title: Chapter 1:A primer on Machine Learning ( 3 hrs )
desc: Types of Learning - Supervised, Unsupervised and Reinforcement
Types of Analysis - Descriptive, Predictive, and Prescriptive
Bias Variance Tradeoff - Overfitting vs Underfitting

chap.title: Chapter 2: Regression
desc: What is linear in Linear Regression?
Model Evaluation Metrics for regression problems - MAE, RMSE, MSE, and MAP

chap.title: Chapter 3: Classification
desc: Up sampling, Down sampling and SMOTE

chap.title: Chapter 4: Clustering-K means
desc: K Means Algorithms - Partition based model for clustering

chap.title: Chapter 5: KNN
desc: Non-Parametric algorithms and Lazy learning ideology
Applications in Missing value imputes and Balancing datasets

chap.title: Chapter 7: Decision Trees
desc: Why are they called Greedy Algorithms?

chap.title: Chapter 8: Ensemble Techniques
desc: Introduction to Bagging as an Ensemble technique
Bootstrap Aggregation and Out of Bag error
Random Forests and its Applications in Feature selection
How Bagging overcomes the overfitting problem?
How Boosting overcomes the Bias - Variance Tradeoff
Gradient Boosting and Xgboost as regularised boosting

chap.title: Chapter 11: Time-series Analysis
desc: The Random Walk model and Stationarity of Time Series
Tests for Stationarity - ADF and Dickey- Fuller test, AR, MA, ARIMA, SARIMA models
A regression approach to time series forecasting.

chap.title: Chapter 12: Machine Learning Pipeline & auto ML
desc: Serving the model via Rest API & Keras.

Module0.title: Module 4
Module0.descS: Gain the skills and knowledge you need to make the most of deep learning for everything from image recognition to natural language processing and predictive modeling. Get to know the ins and outs of AI, deep learning, CNNs, RNNs, and other cutting-edge techniques.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Deep Neural Networks
desc: Tools for deep learning models - Tflearn and Pytorch
The problem of Exploding and Vanishing gradients

chap.title: Chapter 4: Convolutional Neural networks
desc: Architecture and design of a Convolutional network,

chap.title: Chapter 5: Recurrent Neural networks and LSTMs.
desc: RN N & LSTM structure, Bidirectional RNNs and Applications on Sequential data
Advanced Time series forecasting using RNNs with LSTMs

chap.title: Chapter 6: Restricted Boltzmann Machines and Autoencoders.
desc: Application of RBMs in Collaborative filtering

Module0.title: Module 5
Module0.descS: This module will help you figure out the ins and outs of text data. You'll learn the basics of analyzing, manipulating, and extracting meaning from text, so you can create smart apps, make decisions based on data, and improve your data science abilities.

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Language modelling
desc: N-gram Language models: Perplexity and Smoothing
Introduction to Hidden Markov models, Viterbi algorithms
MEMMs and CRFs for named entity recognition
Application of LSTMs to predict the next word.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Sequence to Sequence tasks
desc: NLP with machine translation for text analysis
How to implement a conversational Chatbot

chap.title: Chapter 4: Capstone Project
desc: backend and  deployment process for chatbot

Module0.title: Module 6
Module0.descS: Discover the exciting world of Reinforcement Learning (RL) in the context of Data Science. In this module, you will delve into the fundamentals of RL, a powerful machine learning paradigm that enables algorithms to make sequential decisions by learning from their interactions with the environment.

desc: The multi-armed bandit problem and the explore-exploit dilemma
Approximation Methods (i.e., how to plug in a deep neural network or other differentiable model into your RL algorithm)

Module0.title: Module 7
Module0.descS: Whether you're interested in object detection, image classification, facial recognition, or the countless other applications of Computer Vision, this module will equip you with the knowledge and skills to tackle real-world data challenges and unlock the potential of visual data in the field of data science.

desc: R-CNN and RetinaNet models for Object detection using Tensorflow
IoU and Dice score for model evaluation

Module0.title: Module 8
Module0.title1: Data Structures and Algorithms ( 12 Weeks ) (only in Pro Max)
Module0.descS: From understanding the significance of data structures to mastering algorithmic problem-solving, this module equips you with the critical skills needed to excel in the field of data science. You will be solving 250+ coding challenges under guidance of expert mentors working in Tier 1 companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe, Facebook, Google etc.

desc: Array basics, Problem solving techniques with example

chap.title: Note
desc: Total Number of problems to be solved in live class: 120+

Module0.title: Module 9
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Excel Fundamentals
desc: Excel Toolbars: Hiding, Displaying, and Moving Toolbars.
Switching Between Sheets in a Workbook.
Hiding and Unhiding Columns, Rows and Sheets.
Opening, saving and closing Excel document.

chap.title: Chapter 2: Worksheet Customization
desc: Creating Headers, Footers, and Page Numbers.
Adjusting Row Height and Column Width.
Moving and Copying Data in an Excel Worksheet.
Inserting and Deleting Rows and Columns.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Images and Shapes into Excel Worksheet
Chapter 4: Basic work on Excel
desc: Entering and selecting values. Using numeric data in excel
Working with forms menu, cell references, conditional
Finding and replacing information from worksheet
Inserting & deleting cells, rows and columns.

chap.title: Chapter 5: Excel Formulae
desc: Im plementing excel formulae in worksheet
Relative vs Absol ute cell references in formulae
Entering and Editing text, Fixing errors in your formulae
Formulae with several operators, Formulae with cell ranges

chap.title: Chapter 6: Excel Functions
desc: Working with functions like SUM(), AVERAGE() etc
Adjacent cells error in excel calculations

chap.title: Chapter 7: Working with Charts and Graphs
desc: Working with the excel chart ribbon.
Adding and modifying data on an Excel chart.
Moving a chart to another worksheet.
Adding titles, gridlines and a data table.
Formatting a data series and chart axis.
Changing a chart type and working with pie charts.

chap.title: Chapter 8: Support Vector Machines
desc: Structuring Source Data for Analysis in Excel
Exploring Pivot Ta ble Analyse & Desig n Options
Working with and on pivot tables
Enriching data with Pivot table calculated values & fields

chap.title: Chapter 9: Basic Macros
desc: Assigning a Macro a Shortcut Key.

chap.title: Chapter 10: Introduction to SQL
desc: All about SQL Difference between SQL & MongoDB.
Different Structured Query languages Why MySQL?

chap.title: Chapter 16: JOINS & Functions
desc: Usage of different types of JOINS
Usage of string functions like; CONCAT, SUBSTRING etc
OUTER join, Full join, Left Join, Right Join, UNION.

chap.title: Chapter 17: Advance SQL
desc: Timestamps and Extract, CURRENT DATE & TIME, EXTRACT
AGE, TO_CHAR, Mathematical Functions and Operators
ROUND, SETSEED, Operators and their precedence.

chap.title: Chapter 19: Mongo DB
desc: What are Object Ids in MongoDb.

chap.title: Chapter 20: Introduction To Tableau
desc: Different charts on TABLEAU (Bar graphs, Line graphs, Scatter graphs, Crosstabs, Histogram, Heatmap, Tree maps, Bullet graphs, etc.)

chap.title: Chapter 21: Data Types in Tableau
desc: Adding a second layer moving average.

chap.title: Chapter 22: Mapping and Analytics
desc: Creating a map, working with hierarchies.
Image Creating a Scatter Plot, Applying Filters to Multiple Worksheets.

chap.title: Chapter 23: Calculations
desc: level of detail common calculation functions

chap.title: Chapter 24: Dashboard and Stories
desc: Working in views with Dashboard and stories

chap.title: Chapter 25: Introducation To Power BI
desc: Understanding the Power BI Desktop Workflow.
Exploring the Interface of the Data Model.

chap.title: Chapter 26: Query Editor
desc: Connecting Power BI Desktop to Source Files.

chap.title: Chapter 27: Power BI
desc: Working with Time series Understanding aggregation and granularity
Filters and Slicers in Power BI

chap.title: Chapter 28: Data Models
desc: SUM, AVERAGE, MIN, MAX, SUMX, COUNT, DIVIDE, COUNT, COUNTROOMS, CALCULATE, FILTER, ALL

chap.title: Chapter 29: Time Intelligence
desc: Create data table in M and DAX, Display last refresh Date.

AboutCourseHeading.heading: What is data science and who is a data scientist ?
AboutCourseHeading.para: In today's digital age, the amount of data generated every day is enormous. Companies and organizations are always looking for ways to extract value from this data to gain a competitive edge in their respective industries. This is where the field of data science comes in. In this article, we will discuss what data science is and who a data scientist is. We will also explore the benefits of pursuing a data science course in Mumbai offered by Skillslash.

data.heading: What is Data Science?
data.para: Data Science is a multidisciplinary field that involves the use of scientific methods, processes, algorithms, and systems to extract insights and knowledge from data. It combines statistical analysis, data mining, machine learning, and visualization techniques to turn raw data into actionable insights that can be used to make informed business decisions.
data.para1: Data science is used in a wide range of industries, including healthcare, finance, marketing, retail, and many others. Some of the applications of data science include predicting customer behavior, identifying fraud, optimizing business operations, and developing personalized healthcare treatments.

data.heading: Who is a Data Scientist?
data.para: A data scientist is a professional who has the skills and knowledge to extract insights from large datasets. They have a deep understanding of statistics, machine learning, and data visualization techniques. They are also proficient in programming languages like Python, R, and SQL.
data.para1: Data scientists work with raw data to identify patterns and trends that can help organizations make informed decisions. They are responsible for designing and implementing data-driven solutions to complex business problems. Data scientists also play a crucial role in the development of machine learning models, which are used to automate tasks and improve business processes.

data.heading: Why Pursue a Data Science Course in Mumbai??
data.para: Mumbai is a thriving hub for IT and technology companies in India, making it an ideal location for anyone interested in pursuing a career in data science. Skillslash offers a comprehensive data science course in Mumbai that is designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed in this field.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Go through the FAQs to know more about our Data Science course in Mumbai.

FaqDATA.ques: Does this Data science course in Mumbai have any requirements before enrollment ?
FaqDATA.ans: No, with this data science course in Mumbai there is no need for any previous expertise or knowledge as such for one to enroll and learn. However, a basic technical background is appreciated. But the data science course in Mumbai is open to people from all backgrounds and levels of experiences.

FaqDATA.ques: How to enroll in the data science course in Mumbai ?
FaqDATA.ans: If you wish to join our Data science course in Mumbai make sure to check our Skillslash website to sign up and enroll yourselves into our Data Science training in Mumbai. You can also enroll by contacting us on our email: info@skillslash.com or 8391- 911- 911 for further details on the application process towards the course of your choice.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the data science course duration in Mumbai ?
FaqDATA.ans: Our data science course in Mumbai subscriptions last from 1 year with the Pro plan and up to 3 years with the Pro Max plan and you can grab a lifetime access with our Pro Max plan.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the topics covered in this data science course in Mumbai ?
FaqDATA.ans: This data science course in Mumbai covers all the areas from basics to advanced data science tools and their applications. This course in Mumbai, by Skillslash covers basic programming of Python, applied statistics, machine learning, NLP, deep learning, Data science tools, Power BI and everything one needs to know to succeed as a data scientist.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the known advantages of this Data Science Course in Mumbai ?
FaqDATA.ans: With the coming of this course by Skillslash, one is introduced to learning everything: data cleaning, data analysis, machine learning algorithms, natural language processing, computer vision and how to create AI-powered applications, plus more in a professional manner. Plus, everyone will get an opportunity to work on actual real-time projects with companies, and earn themselves a Microsoft and real-time work experience certification to add to your resume. While also offering guaranteed job referrals to our students to help them get placed and work on their career in data science.

Yes, after completing your course at Skillslash, you will receive an opportunity to work on live projects from companies and receive a certification for the same and further we also provide job referrals to help you score a placement of your choice.

FaqDATA.ques: The average salary of a data scientist ?
FaqDATA.ans: If you're looking for a Data Scientist job in Mumbai , you will be glad to know: that the average salary for a data scientist in Mumbai in companies varies from between INR 8 to INR 17 lakhs with an approximate average yearly earning of 1.5 Lakhs in rupees.

FaqDATA.ques: Can freshers enroll in this data science course in Mumbai ?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, this data science course in Mumbai is open for all levels of experience and backgrounds. This course is designed keeping in mind the presence of freshers and thus, trains you from scratch to help get you introduced to the data science world, and create your data science career.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the topics covered in this data science course in Mumbai ?
FaqDATA.ans: This data science course in Mumbai covers all the areas from basics to advanced data science tools and their applications. The data science course by Skillslash covers the basic programming of Python, applied statistics, machine learning, NLP, deep learning, Data science tools, Power BI and many more interesting topics of importance that every data science aspirant needs to know to succeed.
